meanings.definition: The act of giving someone permission or power to do something.
meanings.sent1: She received authorization to access the confidential files.
meanings.sent2: The manager granted authorization for the project to proceed.
meanings.sent3: The authorization to eat all the cookies was met with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: His authorization to lead the team made him feel like a captain of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The golden key symbolized the authorization to enter the secret chamber.

meanings.definition: The process of officially allowing someone to have or do something.
meanings.sent1: The authorization for the event was approved by the committee.
meanings.sent2: After completing the paperwork, she finally received authorization to drive.
meanings.sent3: The authorization to skip homework was a dream come true for the students.
meanings.sent4: Her authorization to enter the exclusive club felt like winning a prize.
meanings.sent5: The special badge served as the authorization to enter the restricted area.

meanings.definition: The power or right to give orders or make decisions.
meanings.sent1: The general had the authorization to deploy troops in the region.
meanings.sent2: With great authority, she exercised her authorization to hire new employees.
meanings.sent3: The authorization to choose the movie for movie night sparked a debate.
meanings.sent4: His authorization to control the budget was like holding the keys to the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The crown represented the ultimate authorization to rule the kingdom.
